title: Senior Data Analyst (Product Analytics)
description: Own product analytics for experimentation, funnel analysis, and KPI dashboards. Partner with PMs to drive insights and measurement.

title: LLM Engineer (RAG + Agents)
description: Build and deploy LLM-powered applications with RAG and agent workflows. Focus on grounding, citations, evals, and production hardening.

title: ML Engineer (Recommendations)
description: Develop recommendation models, deploy to production, and monitor performance. Collaborate with data engineering and product.

title: Backend Engineer (API Platform)
description: Build reliable APIs and backend services. Improve scalability, observability, and developer experience.

title: Frontend Engineer (React)
description: Build a modern web UI, improve performance and accessibility, and collaborate closely with design.

title: AI Engineer (Customer Support Copilot)
description: Ship an internal copilot for support agents. Prioritize grounding, safety, and measurable quality improvements.

title: Analytics Engineer (dbt + Snowflake)
description: Model analytics tables, build reliable transformations in dbt, and publish metrics for stakeholders.

title: MLOps Engineer (Kubernetes + MLflow)
description: Build ML platform tooling for training/deployments, experiment tracking, and production monitoring.

title: Software Engineer (Event Streaming)
description: Develop event-driven services, optimize throughput, and maintain high reliability.

title: UI Engineer (Next.js)
description: Lead UI architecture, ship accessible experiences, and mentor engineers.
